item.description:
TAKE THE 8 STEPS THAT WILL CHANGE YOUR LIFE

 

** The Carver Den will be hosting holiday parties this evening. The Steppers are welcome to partake in the festivities. It is not too late to donate an unwrapped toy. Our lessons/practice might be relocated into another function room.  Also our hosts could use our help wrapping gifts.

Beginners Welcome!!
Men, Women, Singles, Couples

*** Please wear comfortable clothes and smooth bottom shoes (NO SNEAKERS, MARKING SOLES or RUBBER BOTTOMS)! ***


Doors open at 6:00pm.
Instructional Hour starts @6:15 p.m.** --- Bring your Steppin' notebook
Courtesy Note:: Please be on time.
Practice outside of class is expected and necessary.

** Free parking available in private lot. Escorts to/from vehicle upon request. In house security.  Steppers look out for each other and take care of their own.

Steppin'Practice 6:00 pm-8:30 pm.

**The University of Steppin' Certified Instruction provided by The Original Steppers of Boston Inc 2006 Team**

Full Bar!!
We welcome you to stop by to get an idea of what Steppin' Chicago Style is all about. There is a $10 participation fee to get on the dance floor, first visit is FREE. We ask that you patronize the bar and tip the staff for their services.

 

It's easy to join our mailing list!

Just send your email address by text message:

Text BOSTONSTEPS to 22828 to get " The Steppin' Times Newsletter"

Message and data rates my apply

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: "Chicago Style" Steppin' Dance Class & Practice at The Den
